sourcesContent:
<template>
	<van-button
		:type="type"
		:native-type="nativeType"
		:size="size"
		:to="to"
		@click="itserveButtonClicked"
		class="sm:max-w-xs text-xl text-black font-medium"
		color="linear-gradient(to right, #E84762, #F4F474)"
	>
		<slot name="icon"></slot>
		{{ value }}
	</van-button>
</template>
<script>
export default {
	name: 'itserve-button',
	props: {
		type: String,
		value: String,
		nativeType: String,
		icon: Boolean,
		size: String,
		to: String,
		class: String,
	},
	methods: {
		itserveButtonClicked() {
			this.nativeSendEvent('bottomBar', {});
		},
	},
};
</script>
<style scoped></style>
